title: The Pangburn Fiasco
description:
Pangburn Philosophy - the company responsible for a series of high profile talks featuring members of the Intellectual Dark Web - has folded, after a months-long twitter meltdown of epic proportions. 

What started out as an exciting event series featuring talks by figures like Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris, Eric and Bret Weinstein - turned into a fiasco of cancelled shows, twitter spats and un-refunded tickets.

David and Alexander discuss the story to date, examine why the model Pangburn was using didn't fit the emergent conversation of the Intellectual Dark Web, and discuss how it could be done right in the future. 

Link to announcement of Pangburn Philosophy folding: https://twitter.com/PangburnInspire/status/1062431248205864962

The next instalment of 'Rebel Wisdom Live' will be 'Divided Brain, Divided World' with Iain McGilchrist in London on November 20th at 7pm GMT. We will be live streaming, and if you want to attend in person visit https://www.tickettailor.com/events/rebelwisdom/208356/

Rebel Wisdom is a platform for the biggest ideas around. 
http://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/

Find us on iTunes and Spotify, or visit rebelwisdom.podbean.com to download Rebel Wisdom as an audio podcast. 

To help us make more of these films, please consider becoming a Patron: www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom
